profile.title: Jëmmalinu jëfandikukat
profile.mustLogin: Faww nga dugal sa kont ngir gis réglaj yi.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Wone mbir mi ndaxte ak tekki bi
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Wone sa mbir ak tekki bi benn-benn
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Seken yu des ba ñu far boppam
profile.noPrivateKey: Amul caabi bu bopp (private key) ci masin bii ngir génne.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tànnal baatu jàll ngir xaatim sa dencukaay:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Dugal baatu jàll bi ngir bii dencukaay:
profile.importSuccess: Caabi bu bopp bi tuddal na ci masin bii.
profile.importFailed: Antuwul aaru caabi (baatu jàll ba ñuul walla dencukaay bi dañu ko yàq).
profile.keysRotated: Jëmmalukaay yu bees (key pair) sos nañu te publig key bi yónnee na.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Sa caabi bu bopp du génn masin bii dara. Génnalal ab dencukaay bu xaatim ngir mën ko delloo ci yeneen masin.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Yaa ngi ci Free — jëfandikoo Sun/Moon ci suuf si. Yeesalil ngir am yeneen tem.
profile.backupDesc: Sos dencukaay yu xaatim ci sa caabi, te delloo ko ci beneen masin ngir jàppante.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Nattal su aplikasioŋ bi du ci kanam
profile.notifyOnCopy: Yëgle ma su ñu duppi sama bataaxal
profile.followHint: Seen stories dina nekk ci sa feed “Following” bu ñu poste ak xeltu “Followers” (walla “Public”).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Lu ñu manul a dox am na ci seetu bii.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Jublante woowe ak téks yii di ñëw ci sa telefon walla imeel bu ñu settantal. Soo woowe/téksi yóbbu, sa nimero Chatforia mi leen mën a feeñ.
profile.quietHoursOptional: Waxtu yi neex du tedd (doora la)
profile.errQuietHours: Waxtu yu neex du tedd dañuy ëpp 0 ak 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Fal benn mbind walla këru waxtaan ngir tàmbali waxtaan
chat.emptySubtitle: Yónnee ab bataaxal ngir tàmbali waxtaan.

status.filesNote: Ba 5 dencukaay. Mëdd: 24 waxtu ci ndigal.

premium.heading: Dugg ci Premium
premium.description: Ubbi jëf yi am solo & summu reklam yi.

auth.headline: Jokkoo bu wóor, àdduna boppam ak tekki bu gaaw
auth.description: Xaatim-bopp (E2E), tekki bu AI di dox, bataaxal yu di réer, ak woowe/widio.

feature.disappearing: Bataaxal yu di réer & xamle jàng
feature.privacy: Sutura ci kanam. Sa done, sa njiitu.

auth.keepSignedIn: Baal ma may toog ci dugg
auth.desktopTip: Soo doon ci ordinatëër, skane ak sa telefon ngir jële aplikasioŋ bi.
auth.subhead: Waxtaan wu sutura, xaatim-bopp, te ñu tekki ko — leegi-leegi.
auth.tip: Mën nga jëfandikoo Chatforia ci benn masin yépp — walla yeb aplikasioŋ bi ngir gëna neex.
auth.scanHint: Skane ngir yeb aplikasioŋ bi walla ubbi ci say bansoor.

home.title: Kër
home.subheader: Yónnee ab bataaxal ngir tàmbali waxtaan.

press.title: Xaaj yi ñu bind
press.contact: Soo bëggee jokkoo ci mbirum xibaar, bindel nun ci press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Soo bëggee jokkoo ci mbirum xibaar, bindel nun ci press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ab messenjeer la bu wóor ak tekki leegi ak xaatim-bopp (E2E), ngir yokk jokkoo yu sutura ci àdduna.
press.assetsText: Logo, ekran-shoot ak nataali njàngat (dina ñëw).

careers.title: Ligéey
careers.intro: Benneen ndaw lañu, ñuy sos ab messenjeer bu wóor, àdduna boppam. Soo leen bëggee kaarange, doxalin bu yomb, ak UX bu neex, nuy wax la.
careers.openRoles: Kër ligéey yu ubbeeku: Inxiniër (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Ndimbal.
careers.apply: Noonu lañu di jël jëf: Yónnee sa CV/jiitu yépp ci jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Lu jëm ci Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ab messenjeer la bu wóor, baaxalil làkk yu bari ak xaatim-bopp, tekki leegi, ak woowe/widio. Sunu ñiir: jàppante nit ñi — ci sutura, te gëstu làkk du teeñ.

values.control: Kontorol: Bataaxal yu di réer & xamle jàng mën nga tëŋgal.

about.howDescription: Bataaxal yi dañu leen xaatim ci sa masin laata ñu génn. Tekki, dencukay ak jàppante masin nu ko defa ndax seen sutura ngir li server mën xam yàggul.

advertise.title: Def reklam ak Chatforia
advertise.description: Jot ay jëfandikukat yu dëkk ci waxtaan, ak ñakk-ndaxu reklam. Nu am bannaar ci barab yi ñu gëna seet, tëralin, ak sponsòor. Ñi ci Premium duñu gis reklam.

adsense.withPubId: Leegi nu jëfandikoo Google AdSense. Soo bëggee jàppale ci Google Ads, jëfandikoo publisher ID {{pubId}} te laaj managed placement ci sunu unit yi ci suuf. Sponsòor baax na itte — jëfandikoo form bi.
adsense.noPubId: Leegi nu jëfandikoo Google AdSense. Sponsòor yu toog it am na — jëfandikoo forme bi ci suuf.

advertise.noPlacements: Amul placements ñu sampul. Yokk leen ci ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Toppandoo yu bari ak waxtu yu yàgg ci UI waxtaan
why.brandSafe: Formaat yu aada; jaxasoo bu mën xam (frequency capping)
why.sponsoredMoments: Xëtu sponsòor (misaal, “Start a Chat” modal) am na
why.deals: Liggéey bu directe walla ci AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Jërëjëf! Sa laaj bi di ñëw. Dinañu la tontu bésub ndaw.
form.successToast: Jërëjëf! Dinañu la laaj ba pare.
form.mailtoInfo: Mën na sa aplikasioŋ imeel ubbi ngir yónnee laaj bi…
form.messageLabel: Waxal nu lu jëm ci sa kanam
form.messagePlaceholder: Targeting, bes yi, KPI, yenn yoon/placement…

upgrade.title: Yeesal
upgrade.subtitle: Fal plaan bi la gëna laaj la: summu reklam ak Plus, walla am jëf yi mat ak Premium.

free.title: Free
free.ctaUnavailable: Dellu ci Free (du ñu ko may)

features.ringtones: Sangu woowe & dawali bataaxal bu bopp

gettingStarted.title: Tàmbali
gettingStarted.subtitle: Ndax yaa bees ci Chatforia? Benn ñaari mint yi ngir dugg ci liggéey bi ndax lu teddul.

alert.text: Jàng bi dina gën a baax bi nu deŋgaale jëf yu bees. Soo gisul lu mëna laaj, wax nu ci

section2.title: 2) Tàmbali waxtaan
section2.item1: Sos DM walla Mbooloo te yónnee sa bataaxal bi jëkk.
section2.item2: Jëfandikoo tekki leegi ngir waxtaan ci 100+ làkk.
section2.item3: Jéemal bataaxal yu di réer ak xamle jàng ci Jëmmalin → Sutura.

section3.title: 3) Jall lu gën
section3.item2Part1: Jappal yeneen masin te samp dencukaay yu xaatim ci

account.q: Nan laay sos walla dëppoo sama kont?
account.a: Yeb aplikasioŋ bi walla jëfandikoo web, tappu “Sos kont”, wóorlu sa imeel/telefon. Ngir dëppoo, jëfandikoo “Màbb baatu jàll”.

privacy.q: Ndax bataaxal yi dañu leen xaatim-ci-ñoom (E2E)?
privacy.a: Waaw. Bataaxal ak woowe dañu leen xaatim ci ndigal. Yaa ngi moom ak ki nga yónnee rekk ñooy mën a ko jàng.

translate.q: Naka la tekki leegi di dox?
translate.a: Suqali “Tekki boppam” ci Reglaj → Xew-xew & Làkk. Nu tekki ci masin bi su kenn mën, ndax du ko mën, ñu ngi jëfandikoo API yu wóor te xibaar yi gënni tuuti.

contact.a: Bindel nu ci support@chatforia.com. Yokk nataal yu mànnaa topp ak sa version aplikasioŋ.

contact.title: Jokkoo ak nun
contact.successMsg: Jërëjëf — sunu mbooloom dina la tontu ci imeel.
contact.errorSend: Mënul yónnee. Bindel ci support@chatforia.com su la neexee.

intro.body: Policy bii mi ngi wone nanu noonu Chatforia (“ñu”, “nun”) di jang, jëfandikoo, te seddoo xibaar boo jëfandikoo sunu aplikasioŋ ak sarwiis yi. Nu samp Chatforia ngir lu nu mën a gis yàggul.

infoWeCollect.title: Li nu jang
infoWeCollect.account: Xibaaru kont (misaal imeel/telefon) ngir sos te kaarange sa kont.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Li ñu xaatim (bataaxal/woowe) xaatim-bopp la; maneesu leen jàng.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Njuumte/doxalin ni logs, giirub masin, walla anaalitik yu tuuti ngir yokk doole.

howWeUse.title: Naka lanu jëfandikoo xibaar yi
howWeUse.provide: Jox ak kaarange sarwiis bi (auth, seetlu spam/bonnaange).

sharing.title: Seddoo
sharing.body: Duñu jaay xibaaru nit. Mën nanu seddoo lu tuuti ak yeneen liggéeykat (misaal: push, anaalitik) ci kaw ndigal yi dëgg.

rights.title: Sa yitte yi
rights.body: Ginnaaw sa barab (misaal: GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), mën nga laaj gis, sett, far, walla dëggal boppu sa xibaar. Jokkoo: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Denc ak kaarange
retention.body: Nu denc lu war te am ngir doxal sarwiis bi te nu jëf kaarange yu industri. Li ñu xaatim E2E maneesu ko dakk.

children.title: Xale
children.body: Chatforia du sarwiis bu ñuy jox xale yu ëpp 13 at (walla muy yoonu sa réew).

changes.title: Yeesal yi
changes.body: Dinañu bind yeesal fii te soppi “Yeesal bi mujj”.

contact.title: Jokkoo
contact.body: privacy@chatforia.com • [Turu kampaani bi ci yoon], [Màkkaanu adrees]

intro.body: Soo jëfandikoo Chatforia, dangaa nangu tërëm yile. Soo nanguwul, bul jëfandikoo sarwiis bi.

accounts.title: Kont yi
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Jox xibaar yu dëgg te aar sa kal.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Yaw la nga dundal sunu sarwiis ci sa kont.

acceptableUse.title: Jëfandikoo bu baax
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Bul def lu ñu may, lu bon, walla lu di jagleel; bul def spam walla njaxlafu otomatik.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Man nanu taxawal/teq sarwiis bi bu ñu yéemu loolu.

yourContent.title: Sa mboolem xibaar
yourContent.body: Yaw nga moom sa xibaar. Nga jox nu sañ-sañ yi war ngir doxal sarwiis bi (misaal: yónnee, denc, tekki).

disclaimer.title: Naka dox & njariñu njumte
disclaimer.body: Sarwiis bi ñu ko jox “nu ko donne noonu” te amul téere. Ci kaw yoon yi, Chatforia du nañu lay rogal lu mel ci njariñu mbégte yi.

changes.title: Yeesal yi
changes.body: Mën nañu yeesal yile; boo kontinee jëfandikoo ginnaaw yeesal yi, maanaam dangaa nangu leen.

contact.title: Jokkoo
contact.body: support@chatforia.com • [Turu kampaani bi ci yoon], [Màkkaanu adrees]

doNotSell.title: Bul jaay walla seddoo sama xibaar bopp
doNotSell.body: Chatforia du jaay xibaaru nit. Ñi dëkk California mën nañu laaj ci suñu yitte yi (CPRA) ci butoŋ bi ci suuf.

cookies.title: Tàmbal Cookies
cookies.body: Chatforia jëfandikoo cookies yu tuuti (misaal: sesiyoŋ, kaarange). Duñu jëfandikoo cookies yu reklam yu ñu weer. Saytu cookies ci réglajub say brawsa.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Mënula yeb xaalis bu nimero telefon bi.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Amuloo nimero. Falal benn ci area code ngir tàmbali téksi.

startChatModal.title: Tàmbali waxtaan
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Bindal tur, turu jëfandikukat, telefon, walla imeel…
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Wut ci turu jëfandikukat walla telefon
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Bindal turu jëfandikukat walla telefon te tappu Wut.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Telefon/imeel yi ngay duggal dinañu man a nekk ginnaaw boo aare ko ci kontàŋ.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Antuwul tàmbali waxtaan ak ñi falewoon.

sounds.freeNotice: Yaa ngi ci Free — dawali premium yi ñuy wone rekk te tëj nañu. Yeesal ngir ubbi yépp.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Jëf jii dafa laaj plaan Premium.

aiSettings.title: Reglaj yu AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Tàmbali/sàkk tekki, tontu yu xam-xam, ak ForiaBot auto-responses.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Tekki boppam bataaxal yi di ñëw
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Wone mbir mi ak tekki bi benn-benn
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Yónnee AI yeneen bataaxal yi yóbbuwaat (gàddaay) ngir joxe tontu yu gaaw.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Nattu baat yi dëgër ci tontu yu AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Soo suqalée, tontu yi dellu ci AI dinañu natt baat yi ñu daganal
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Suqali tontu boppam su ma neexul

accessibilitySettings.title: Doxalin & Alarba
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Tann yi ngir def Chatforia yomb te mu ñeme janq ndax dawali kàddu.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Daj na ci dayo bu normale. Yokk ko su la neex ci doxalin.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Alarba yu gànjar ngir bataaxal & woowe
Wone bannaar ak feeñu turu xëtu kaw ngir bul bàyyi mbir yi.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew: Vibire su amee bataaxal bu bees (su masin bi mën)
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall: Fëccal ekran su ñu woo la
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Tekki boppam kàddu yi (voice)
Yokk ab tekki ci ay bataaxal audio yi nga jot.
accessibilitySettings.changesSavedInstantly: Yoonu soppi yi aareesu na leegi-leegi.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Alarba yu gànjar ngir bataaxal & woowe
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Wone bannaar ak feeñu turu xëtu kaw ngir bul bàyyi mbir yi.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Vibire su amee bataaxal bu bees (su mën)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Tambali vibire bi ci alarba yi.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Fëcc gu ndaw su amee woowe.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Dencal ciphertext rekk ci server. Dina suul AI/Tekki ak seetlu modereesin.

help.title: Ndimbal
help.howCanWeHelp: Naka lanu la mën a dimbali?

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Wut ci aliyas, tur, turu jëfandikukat, walla telefon
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Yenn yoon yu gaaw ngir dox.
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Seddoo sa lëkkal wóotal ngir tàmbali waxtaan leegi.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Toog ci jokkoo ak Chatforia ci iOS ak Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Làkk: Say bataaxal dinañu jàppante ci web ak mobile.

randomChat.title: Waxtaanu randam
randomChat.description: Xamewuloo kenn? Ñu la boole ak kenn leegi te ubbi këru waxtaan bu jot.
randomChat.saveGuard: Bataaxal nit-ak-nit rekk lañu man a aar
